title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences) (Australia) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (australia) order 2023

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Act of 1961” means the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961); 

“Regulations of 2006” means the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) 
Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006); 

“vehicle with automatic transmission” means a vehicle in which no clutch 
pedal (or lever operated manually for categories A, A1 or A2, within the 
meaning of Regulation 6 of the Regulations of 2006) is present.
text_norm: 2 order - act 1961 mean road traffic act 1961 (no 24 1961) regulation 2006 mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006) vehicle automatic transmission mean vehicle clutch pedal (or lever operated manually category a1 a2 within meaning regulation 6 regulation 2006) present

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a
text_raw:
3. 

It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a 
mechanically propelled vehicle, not being a licence or permit issued to a person 
to enable that person to learn or provisionally to drive such a vehicle, issued by 
a competent authority of Australia, is recognised for the purpose of exchange 
of that licence or permit for a driving licence, in respect of any one or more of 
the categories in respect of which the licence or permit is held that corresponds 
to a category mentioned in the Table to Regulation 6 of the Regulations of
text_norm: 3 declared licence permit permitting person drive mechanically propelled vehicle licence permit issued person enable person learn provisionally drive vehicle issued competent authority australia recognised purpose exchange licence permit driving licence respect one category respect licence permit held corresponds category mentioned table regulation 6 regulation

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: 4. (1) A driving licence being granted in exchange for a licence or permit
text_raw:
4. (1) A driving licence being granted in exchange for a licence or permit 
referred to in Article 3 shall only permit the person whose licence or permit is 
exchanged to drive a vehicle with automatic transmission in respect of any one 
or more of the categories referred to in Article 3. 

(2) Notwithstanding paragraph (1), where the competent authority referred 
to in Article 3 confirms that the person exchanging the licence or permit 
concerned completed a test in a vehicle with manual transmission which 
demonstrates the necessary ability to drive a vehicle in respect of any one or 
more of the categories referred to in Article 3 to the satisfaction of the licensing 
authority (within the meaning of section 21 of the Act of 1961), the driving 
licence granted on exchange shall also permit the person to drive a vehicle with 
manual transmission in respect of, as the case may be, that category or those 
categories. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 3 

(3) Paragraph (2) shall not apply where, subsequent to the test referred to in 
that paragraph, the competent authority referred to in Article 3 issued the 
person with a licence or permit which only permits that person to drive a 
vehicle with automatic transmission in the category or categories concerned.
text_norm: 4 (1) driving licence granted exchange licence permit referred article 3 shall permit person whose licence permit exchanged drive vehicle automatic transmission respect one category referred article 3 (2) notwithstanding paragraph (1) competent authority referred article 3 confirms person exchanging licence permit concerned completed test vehicle manual transmission demonstrates necessary ability drive vehicle respect one category referred article 3 satisfaction licensing authority (within meaning section 21 act 1961) driving licence granted exchange shall also permit person drive vehicle manual transmission respect case may category category notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th april 2023 158 3 (3) paragraph (2) shall apply subsequent test referred paragraph competent authority referred article 3 issued person licence permit permit person drive vehicle automatic transmission category category concerned

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: 5. This Order does not apply to a licence or permit issued by Australia in
text_raw:
5. This Order does not apply to a licence or permit issued by Australia in 
exchange for a licence or permit issued by a state other than the State, another 
Member State or a state in respect of which an order under section 23A of the 
Act of 1961 applies.
text_norm: 5 order apply licence permit issued australia exchange licence permit issued state state another member state state respect order section 23a act 1961 applies

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: 6. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences) Order
text_raw:
6. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences) Order 

2007 (S.I. No. 527 of 2007) is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (2) 
of Article 2: 

“(2) This Order does not apply to a licence or permit issued by 
a Member State (other than the State) or a state mentioned 
in the Schedule in exchange for a licence or permit issued 
by a state other than – 

(a) 

the State, 

(b) 

another Member State, 

(c) 

(d) 

and 

a state mentioned in the Schedule, or 

any other state in respect of which an order under 
section 23A of the Act of 1961 applies.”, 

(b) 

in the Schedule, by the deletion of “Australia”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 April, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [158]

title: on me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order recognises Australian driving licences for driving licence exchange 
purposes under section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961. An Irish driving 
licence granted in exchange under this Order will permit a person to drive a 
vehicle with automatic transmission only, unless it can be confirmed by the 
Australian authorities that the person completed and passed a driving test in a 
vehicle with manual transmission. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 5
